thread.title: BRIEF-Leidos Holdings Says Leidos Innovations, As Borrower, Co Entered Into Third Amendment To Credit Agreement

title: BRIEF-Leidos Holdings Says Leidos Innovations, As Borrower, Co Entered Into Third Amendment To Credit Agreement
text: March 20, 2018 / 9:25 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Leidos Holdings Says Leidos Innovations, As Borrower, Co Entered Into Third Amendment To Credit Agreement   Leidos Holdings Inc: * LEIDOS HOLDINGS-ON MARCH 15, LEIDOS INNOVATIONS CORPORATION, AS BORROWER, CO ENTERED INTO THIRD AMENDMENT TO CREDIT AGREEMENT, DATED AUGUST 16, 2016​ * LEIDOS HOLDINGS- PURPOSE OF AMENDMENT WAS TO REDUCE APPLICABLE MARGIN FOR B TERM LOANS OUTSTANDING IMMEDIATELY PRIOR TO AMENDMENT BY 25 BASIS POINTS​ Source text - bit.ly/2ptM8AX
